subtitle.Text: So much has changed, even just since you've been away.
We moved into this house. I'm at a new school. And my big sister being gone for a year doesn't make it any easier.
But I'm not gonna let it faze me. I used to tell you everything. And if I can't do it in person, because you're off gallivanting around who-knows-where, I'll tell it to this journal.
Just like I was talking to you.
